TMC Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Nurse Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Jul 31, 2025, 14:20 IST
 Tata Memorial Centre
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 31-Jul-2025 |  Bihar |  Salary : 22,000 to 28,000




FOLLOW

The Tata Memorial Centre (TMC) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Nurse Positions. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.Sc Nursing, GNM can grab this chance and apply for the TMC Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, and application fee. and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend a walk-in interview at the given address. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Bihar.

TMC Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Nurse	01	B.Sc Nursing, GNM

Age Limit for the TMC Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 30 years.

Selection Process for the TMC Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the TMC Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 22,000 /- per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 28,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the TMC Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the TMC Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the Recruitment or Career Page.
Check for the Nurse Notification 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Then, attend the walk-in interview along with the documents required to the address given below.

Venue

SHRI KRISHNA MEDICAL COLLEGE AND HOSPITAL CAMPUS, UMANAGAR, MUZAFFARPUR (BIHAR) - 842004

Important Dates

Date of Walk-in-Interview	12-08-2025
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
